author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  fix some locking bugs in mod_dav_svn and fs locking backends.
SVN_ERR_FS_NO_USER, and convert it to "401 Unauthorized" so http
clients know to prompt and re-try the request.
(dav_svn_remove_lock):  do what the vtable API says -- if a NULL token
is passed in, then discover any existing lock and remove it.
(svn_fs_attach_lock):  docstring tweak:  require that lock->owner be

author: marcosc
msg: Fixed 63 fuzzy, 45 untranslated and 1 incomplete translated messages.

author: lundblad
msg: Locking branch: The username of an filesystem access descriptor must not be
NULL.  Guaranteeing this simplyfies the uses of this object in other places.
that username must not be NULL.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix bug reported by Jim Correia <jim.correia@pobox.com> in
A file with a space in its name could break 'svn ls' like so:
$ svn ci -m "Add a file with space in its name."
(svn_client_ls2): Don't uri-encode base_name, because it is not

author: sussman
msg: * doc/book/book/ch03.xml, ch09,xml:  clarify meaning of ~ symbol in 'svn st'.
